last_episode_to_air.name: Christmas is Coming
last_episode_to_air.overview: Snoopy does not want to wait until Christmas to open gifts; Charlie Brown tries to afford a gift for a girl; Rerun wants Snoopy to be his sled dog; Charlie Brown cannot walk in his heavy coat.

name: Peanuts
overview: Based on the classic Charles M. Schultz comic strip and featuring Snoopy and Charlie Brown among others.

episodes.name: Come On Snoopy!
episodes.overview: Sally brings Snoopy in for show and tell. Lucy helps Snoopy conquer his fear of the dark. Lucy hates the world. Snoopy interferes with Charlie Brown's television time.

episodes.name: Don't Worry Charlie Brown
episodes.overview: Charlie Brown needs to be rescued from the kite-eating tree.

episodes.name: The Little Red Haired Girl
episodes.overview: Charlie Brown does not flirt very well.

episodes.name: Have a Nice Day Linus
episodes.overview: Lucy tries to convince Linus to give up his blanket; Linus and Snoopy get slivers; Linus is excited about Miss Othmar's return; Sally tries to woo Linus at lunch.

episodes.name: Good Sports
episodes.overview: Peppermint Patty gives a report on summer; Marcie makes baseball caps; Charlie Brown is upset over his team's fly balls; Peppermint Patty helps Marcie with tackling; Linus tries to teach Sally to play football.

episodes.name: Sound & Sensibility
episodes.overview: Lucy sings about money at her psychiatric booth.

episodes.name: Frieda
episodes.overview: Linus gets to meet Frieda and Frieda helps Snoopy find rabbits to chase.

episodes.name: The Mysteries of Love
episodes.overview: Peppermint Patty wants Charlie Brown to teach her about love; Lucy tells Schroeder that flowers mean true love; Lucy imagines married life with Schroeder.

episodes.name: Technical Difficulties
episodes.overview: Sally Brown learns to draw circles.

episodes.name: A Day with Snoopy
episodes.overview: Charlie Brown feeds Snoopy dinner; Snoopy begs for candy; Snoopy supports National Dog Week; Snoopy does the happy dance; Snoopy wants to sleep inside to avoid rain.

episodes.name: A Strong Personality
episodes.overview: Lucy thinks Beethoven should have been married; Linus wants Lucy to share her umbrella.

episodes.name: The Eye of the Beholder
episodes.overview: Peppermint Patty watches a beauty contest on TV. Peppermint Patty asks Charlie Brown for advice. Charlie Brown shares Peppermint Patty’s desk at school.

episodes.name: Miss Othmar
episodes.overview: Linus thinks Miss Othmar likes him. Linus becomes convinced Miss Othmar doesn't like him. Linus is asked to help in class. Linus can't believe teachers get paid to teach.

episodes.name: The School of Hard Knocks
episodes.overview: Peppermint Patty wants to attend a private school and Snoopy suggests an obedience school.

episodes.name: My Blanket!
episodes.overview: Snoopy and Linus struggle over a blanket.

episodes.name: Novel Idea
episodes.overview: Linus reviews Snoopy's story.

episodes.name: No Strings Attached
episodes.overview: Lucy gives Charlie Brown's kite to Snoopy when he is not able to fly it.

episodes.name: A Friend Indeed
episodes.overview: Charlie Brown accidentally falls asleep reading Snoopy a bedtime story.

episodes.name: Crazy Mutt
episodes.overview: Linus teaches Snoopy how to play catch; Charlie Brown helps Snoopy practice his diving skills; Snoopy and Lucy brawl.

episodes.name: Doing It Right
episodes.overview: Charlie Brown gives advice on life.

episodes.name: Like Skates on Ice
episodes.overview: Peppermint Patty gets skating lessons.

episodes.name: Tennis
episodes.overview: Snoopy meets his tennis partner, Molly Volley.

episodes.name: A Little Nap
episodes.overview: Snoopy interrupts Linus's nap; Sally and Peppermint Patty can barely stay awake.

episodes.name: Word of Mouth
episodes.overview: Snoopy gets rid of his bowl when he finds cat food in it.

episodes.name: Good Dog
episodes.overview: Lucy watches Snoopy for Charlie Brown.

episodes.name: Snoopy the Superstar
episodes.overview: Snoopy becomes a lawyer and defends a rabbit as his client.

episodes.name: Train Your Dog
episodes.overview: Snoopy tries to make his dinner more elegant.

episodes.name: A Pretty Picture
episodes.overview: Snoopy paints Woodstock, who later organizes a concert for snowmen.

episodes.name: Leave Me in Peace
episodes.overview: Snoopy and the Beagle Scouts sell tickets for a raffle.

episodes.name: Last of the Bunch
episodes.overview: Lucy finds out that she has a new baby brother.

episodes.name: Too Cold
episodes.overview: Snoopy and Charlie Brown write letters to Santa Claus.

episodes.name: It's Raining, It's Pouring
episodes.overview: Snoopy tries to sleep inside when it rains.

episodes.name: Show Dog
episodes.overview: Snoopy and Lucy arm wrestle and box each other.

episodes.name: Philosophy
episodes.overview: Lucy tells Charlie Brown to make his own philosophy.

episodes.name: Woodstock
episodes.overview: Snoopy and Woodstock ask Charlie Brown about eating turkey.

episodes.name: School Chums
episodes.overview: Peppermint Patty is stuck on her back.

episodes.name: True or False
episodes.overview: Peppermint Patty takes a true or false test.

episodes.name: Nobody Likes Me
episodes.overview: Charlie Brown wants to be popular.

episodes.name: Even-ing the Score
episodes.overview: Linus analyzes a snowball; Snoopy gives Linus and Lucy tickets to a bird hockey game; Linus helps Charlie Brown write a letter to Santa. Lucy is annoyed at her Christmas gifts.

episodes.name: Black and White
episodes.overview: Lucy has everyone sign a document to void her of blame.

episodes.name: Beauty Contest
episodes.overview: Peppermint Patty asks Charlie Brown if she is beautiful.

episodes.name: A New Best Friend
episodes.overview: Sally meets Eudora while they are both on their way to summer camp.

episodes.name: Telling Stories
episodes.overview: Linus reads Snoopy's very complicated story.

episodes.name: Being Nice
episodes.overview: Charlie Brown helps Sally write a thank-you letter to Grandma.

episodes.name: School Is Out!
episodes.overview: Sally decides to go to Hollywood instead of summer camp.

episodes.name: Not Your Day
episodes.overview: Lucy suggests whistling to cure Charlie Brown's sadness; Lucy wants to sulk in her beanbag chair; Sally's date with Linus does not go as planned.

episodes.name: A Little Love
episodes.overview: Charlie Brown waits for Valentine's cards. Charlie Brown makes his own Valentine's cards; Sally tries to free the tennis court for Linus; Sally pretends Linus takes her to the movies.

episodes.name: Love is in the Air
episodes.overview: Pig Pen takes Peppermint Patty to a dance; Sally is sad because Linus did mot send her a card; Marcie asks Charlie Brown out to a show.

episodes.name: A Clean Sweep
episodes.overview: Pig Pen defends being covered in dust; Pig Pen's dust takes over the movie theater; Pig Pen's dirt may have history; Charlie Brown questions Pig Pen's appearance for Lucy's birthday party.

episodes.name: Brothers and Sisters
episodes.overview: Lucy calls Linus stubborn; Lucy bothers Linus while watching TV; Linus explains his thumb rules; Lucy scrutinizes Linus's TV viewing; Lucy wants her beanbag from Linus.

episodes.name: Marcie
episodes.overview: Marcie documents Peppermint Patty's sleeping habits at school. Peppermint Patty says Marcie is crabby; Peppermint Patty questions her grade.

episodes.name: Good for Nothing
episodes.overview: Sally wants Charlie Brown to defend her.

episodes.name: Man's Best Friend
episodes.overview: Snoopy drags Linus along as he runs with his blanket. Linus asks Snoopy to keep his blanket and Snoopy subsequently makes it into a coat.

episodes.name: The Great Outdoors
episodes.overview: Lucy and Charlie Brown watch a puppet show by Snoopy; Woodstock helps Snoopy fish; Lucy and Sally meet a bug; Lucy watches Snoopy while Charlie Brown is away.

episodes.name: Off Key
episodes.overview: Snoopy interrupts Schroeder's piano playing; Peppermint Patty and Marcie attend a concert; Lucy breaks up with Schroeder.

episodes.name: Not My Day
episodes.overview: Lucy sets a record by being crabby for 100 days.

episodes.name: It's Only Love
episodes.overview: Charlie Brown wishes he could have lunch with the Little Red-Haired Girl.

episodes.name: Best Friend
episodes.overview: Peppermint Patty is upset she is not named Student of the Year; Marcie takes care of Peppermint Patty's sleeping head on her desk; Peppermint Patty thinks the teacher calls her ugly.

episodes.name: Strike Out
episodes.overview: Charlie Brown does not want to end a game due to bad weather.

episodes.name: Beware of the Dog
episodes.overview: Snoopy the fierce Vulture scares Linus; Snoopy and Woodstock are afraid of vampires; Snoopy disappears like the Cheshire Cat; Snoopy's brother Spike writes him a letter.

episodes.name: Going My Way
episodes.overview: Snoopy battles with Linus over the blanket.

episodes.name: The Call of the Wild
episodes.overview: The Beagle Scouts gather supplies to go on a hike.

episodes.name: Security
episodes.overview: Lucy buries Linus's blanket. Linus cannot handle his blanket being gone. Snoopy finds Linus's blanket. Linus's blanket tries to attack Lucy; Lucy thinks Linus's blanket hates her.

episodes.name: It's Just No Good
episodes.overview: Sally brings her leaf collection for Show and Tell; Sally breaks a crayon from school; Sally struggles to write a report; Sally gives a report on oceans.

episodes.name: A Bad Mood
episodes.overview: Lucy tells Linus no one is happy all the time; Lucy bosses Linus around while he is watching TV; Linus wants to teach Sally how to pass in football.

episodes.name: Back to School
episodes.overview: Sally goes to beanbag camp; Sally is not ready to go back to school; Sally practices waiting for the bus; Sally prepares Charlie Brown's school lunch and they miss the bus.

episodes.name: Go to School!
episodes.overview: Sally talks to school buildings; Sally is not ready to go back to school; Sally makes her own answers for a test; Charlie Brown and Sally talk numbers; Sally questions field trips.

episodes.name: Go for it, Charlie Brown!
episodes.overview: Charlie Brown is upset over not being tough; Charlie Brown wants Lucy to mess up while jumping rope; Lucy uses math to solve Charlie Brown's love troubles.

episodes.name: Amateurs
episodes.overview: Marcie tries to throw a football. Peppermint Patty wants to trade Marcie for Lucy in baseball. Peppermint Patty tries to teach Lucy baseball.

episodes.name: School Anxiety
episodes.overview: Sally is anxious about school; Linus writes an essay on appreciating school; Peppermint Patty cannot raise her head from sleeping; Linus fails a true or false test.

episodes.name: Autumn is Here
episodes.overview: Snoopy plays with the falling leaves. Linus talks to leaves; Peppermint Patty's hair gets caught in her binder; Peppermint Patty convinces Marcie to play football in the rain.

episodes.name: A Fascinating Friend
episodes.overview: Linus gets called "mister" by Lydia and feels old. Lydia wants Linus to treat her for Valentine's Day; Linus asks for Lydia's address.

episodes.name: Keep Your Chin Up, Charlie Brown
episodes.overview: Charlie Brown asks the kite-eating tree to give back his kite; Snoopy has a bad dream about kites; Charlie Brown tries to find a special card in packs of bubblegum.

episodes.name: Misunderstanding
episodes.overview: Marcie defends herself on the bus. Marcie and Peppermint Patty hear something while they try to sleep at camp; A boy named Floyd keeps calling Marcie "lambcake" and she does not like it; Peppermint Patty tells Floyd love is painful; Floyd wants a picture with Marcie.

episodes.name: Too Cute
episodes.overview: Sally gets a love letter; Charlie Brown and Sally have to buy school supplies; Charlie Brown tells Sally to sleep off the bad day; Charlie Brown writes Sally's book report.

episodes.name: Team Spirit
episodes.overview: Frieda joins Charlie Brown's baseball team; Charlie Brown gets hit on the head; Lucy's only focus during the game is her baseball glove.

episodes.name: Just for Love
episodes.overview: Lucy thinks Schroeder is cute; Frieda is at Schroeder's piano; Frieda offers a used Valentine.

episodes.name: That Day
episodes.overview: Sally asks Santa for a job.

episodes.name: Colors
episodes.overview: Lucy criticizes Linus's coloring.

episodes.name: Trust Me
episodes.overview: Lucy holds the football for Charlie Brown.

episodes.name: School Tomorrow
episodes.overview: Charlie Brown procrastinates; Sally must write a whole page about George Washington.

episodes.name: Nice Doggy
episodes.overview: Charlie Brown tells Linus the story of how he got Snoopy.

episodes.name: Company
episodes.overview: Rerun wants a dog, and wants to borrow Snoopy; Rerun wants a role model; Rerun wins a balloon.

episodes.name: Reach for the Stars
episodes.overview: Sally asks about a science program on TV. Charlie Brown and Linus watch the stars; Sally doubts the Tooth Fairy exits; Snoopy's dog house catches fire.

episodes.name: Creepy Crawlies
episodes.overview: Woodstock has a creature in his nest. Linus explains the importance of bugs; Lucy and Sally meet a bug; Snoopy has a bug in his supper dish.

episodes.name: Kind of Spooky
episodes.overview: Sally does not want to kick a football; Linus watches a scary movie about feet; Linus and Charlie Brown discuss writing to the Great Pumpkin and Santa.

episodes.name: Fly
episodes.overview: Woodstock and Snoopy fly; Linus and Snoopy time Woodstock's flying; Woodstock gets trained to go to the moon.

episodes.name: Feeling Insecure
episodes.overview: Snoopy must get Linus's blanket back from a cat.

episodes.name: Always Right
episodes.overview: Lucy wants respect; Rerun sells his art; Linus guides Snoopy.

episodes.name: Out of Order
episodes.overview: Linus is aware of his tongue; Linus leaves a tooth for the Tooth Fairy.

episodes.name: Problems
episodes.overview: Peppermint Patty likes numbers but not math.

episodes.name: Classic
episodes.overview: Lucy questions Schroeder's practicing the piano; Peppermint Patty and Marcie go to a concert.

episodes.name: Even the Score
episodes.overview: Charlie Brown tries to help his baseball team get hit on the head less with fly balls; Lucy asks Charlie Brown what to say on the baseball field.

episodes.name: Birds of a Feather
episodes.overview: Woodstock and other birds stage a protest; Linus thinks Woodstock is a Canada goose; Linus reads Woodstock's grandpa's diary; Woodstock writes a Mother's Day letter; Woodstock befriends a snowman.

episodes.name: Sally
episodes.overview: Sally insists on homework help; Sally breaks a ruler; Sally keeps a list of people who did not give her Christmas cards; Sally draws a world map; Sally is afraid of a snowman.

episodes.name: A Hard Winter
episodes.overview: Linus explains to Lucy why birds need breadcrumbs; Charlie Brown wants Snoopy to be a better watchdog; Linus builds an army of snowmen. Lucy has a contract for snow shoveling.

episodes.name: Winter Games
episodes.overview: Charlie Brown and Linus catch snowflakes on their tongues.

episodes.name: On Campaign Trail
episodes.overview: Linus decides to run for class president. Sally interviews Linus during his election. Lucy assists in Linus's polls for presidency.

episodes.name: Christmas is On Its Way
episodes.overview: Peppermint Patty wants to find someone less intelligent than her to help her grading curve; Sally compares the sadness of leaves falling to lack of presents on Christmas for Show and Tell.

episodes.name: Winter Wonderland
episodes.overview: Lucy asks Linus to tell snow to stop falling; Snoopy tries to throw a snowball at Lucy; Lucy builds and destroys a snowman; Woodstock wants a Christmas stocking; Charlie Brown helps Linus write a letter to Santa Claus.

episodes.name: Let It Snow
episodes.overview: Linus asks Lucy to write a letter to Santa for him; Sally questions Santa's Nice versus Naughty list. Snoopy and Woodstock enjoy snowflakes; Lucy needs a skating partner.

episodes.name: Get Lucky
episodes.overview: Peppermint Patty recommends an open-book test in class. Peppermint Patty has to read a book over Christmas break.

episodes.name: Weird Little Brother
episodes.overview: Linus pats birds on the head; Linus and Lucy need a measles shot; Lucy does not like Linus's letter to Santa; Lucy wants Linus to break his blanket habit.

episodes.name: Christmas is Coming
episodes.overview: Snoopy does not want to wait until Christmas to open gifts; Charlie Brown tries to afford a gift for a girl; Rerun wants Snoopy to be his sled dog; Charlie Brown cannot walk in his heavy coat.
